pl.chilldev.commons.service.spring.config

Class AbstractDataSourceBeanDefinitionParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.chilldev.commons.service.spring.config.AbstractDataSourceBeanDefinitionParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.xml.BeanDefinitionParser

    public abstract class AbstractDataSourceBeanDefinitionParser
extends Object
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.xml.BeanDefinitionParser
    Data source (entire set of beans related to entities and transactions as well) definition handler.
